mapper.sql: id, out_house_id, out_house_name, station_id, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE refrigeration_house
out_house_id = #{outHouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_house_name = #{outHouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
